name: shift-gear
effect: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage and its Speed by two stages.
short_effect: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage and its Speed by two stages.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack stat and sharply raising its Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack stat and sharply raising its Speed stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack stat and sharply raising its Speed stat.
